teal.utils 0.0.1
  • Reference

teal.utils

The teal.utils is a package of utility functions for setting up and deploying teal apps. The available utilities are:

  • Named Choices (named_choices)
  • Usage Logging (log_app_usage)

Installation

devtools::install_github(
  repo = "NEST/teal.utils",
  host = "https://github.roche.com/api/v3",
  upgrade_dependencies = FALSE
)

library(teal)
library(teal.utils)

shiny_entimice_setup()

ASL <- read_entimice(...)

x <- teal::init()

shinyApp(x$ui, x$server)
